about_the_game:
Oh no! The Evil Hell Fungus army attacks the Pebble Kingdom every night! Tiny but mighty, the Pebbles must defend their Kingdom! Gather shiny things by day, power up, and gain traits to become even stronger Pebbles for battle! When night falls, team up to fight off the evil Fungus and protect your kingdom!

Kingdom Collapse? Any Second Now!

The evil Infernal Hell Fungus Army is attacking the land, ready to destroy everything in its way. With hope running out, only the Pebble King and his last four brave knights can stop them. Step up to help reclaim your kingdom! Together, you must strategize, adapt, and survive the night!

Last King & Knights?

Play as the King or one of four Knights in this thrilling co-op survival defense game. The King can choose abilities to boost the team’s power, while each Knights grows stronger with every battle!

Fungus Fiends Everywhere!

The Hell Fungus Army is relentless, invading the Pebble Kingdom night after night. These creatures multiply and attack in terrifying forms, determined to wipe out the Pebbles!

Beware the dreaded King Hell Fungus—it's powerful and must be defeated before it destroys your defenses!

Power Up? Absolutely! 

Unite your strengths to survive! Use items scattered across the map—collect shiny crystals to power up, grab weapons to gain the upper hand. Unlock powerful traits that grant extraordinary abilities, turning you into the ultimate Pebble warrior!

STAY ALIVE! Survive 'till the end! 

Rise up to defeat the Infernal Hell Fungus Army and save the Pebble Kingdom from destruction. The fate of the realm is in your hands! Adventure, danger, and glory await—join the fight, alone or with allies, and prove your valor!

name: Pebble Knights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-14100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
